abilities.name: That's a Nice Home You Have There
abilities.description: Once per encounter, may make an opposed Coercion versus Vigilance check targeting one other character in the current encounter; if successful, the target suffers 2 strain per :success:; may spend :advantage::advantage: to affect one additional character in the current encounter and have them suffer and equal amount of strain, and spend :triumph: to stagger one affected target until the end of this character's next turn.

abilities.name: Enhanced Strength

abilities.name: Bone-Chilling Roar
abilities.description: Once per encounter, may suffer 3 strain and spend a maneuver to force all other character within long range (or within earshot) to make a :daunting: Discipline check as an out-of-turn incidental. If they fail, they must use their maneuver to maove farther away; if they fail with :threat:, they must also downgrade their action to an additional maneuver to move even farther away. If you're using the fear rules found on page 243 of the Genesys Core Rulebook, this can be a fear check instead.

abilities.name: Impressively Flexible
abilities.description: May spend a Story Point to gain access to a formerly secure room or other location through a previously unnoticed vent shaft, slightly open window, or similar entry point.

abilities.name: Catlike

abilities.name: Air Filter Implant

abilities.name: Rile Them Up
abilities.description: Once per encounter, may make an :average: Charm check targeting a group of bystanders or other neutral NPCs at medium range; if the check is successful, one of the bystanders (plus one per additional :success:) becomes a Human First Extremist; these NPCs form a single minion group and join the ongoing encounter. These NPCs may have been regular people convinced by the rep or they may have been members of Human First all along.
